data.eml:eml: Review of Australian Scirtes Illiger, Ora Clark and Exochomoscirtes Pic (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) including descriptions of new species, new groups and a multi-gene molecular phylogeny of Australian and non-Australian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Watts, Chris H. S., Cooper, Steven J. B., Saint, Kathleen M. (2017): Review of Australian Scirtes Illiger, Ora Clark and Exochomoscirtes Pic (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) including descriptions of new species, new groups and a multi-gene molecular phylogeny of Australian and non-Australian species. Zootaxa 4347 (3): 511-532, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4347.3.5
